text: Bagge & Peer is a songwriter-producer partnership made up of two Swedish music producers Anders Bagge and Peer Åström. They are also major contributors for the Stockholm-based Murlyn Music Group as Bagge is co-founder and co-owner of the music enterprise. Bagge & Peer have together written and produced songs for Lara Fabian, Celine Dion, Cyndi Lauper, Madonna, Ace of Base, Ashley Tisdale, Enrique Iglesias, Jennifer Lopez and several others. ==See also== *Anders Bagge *Peer Åström Category:Swedish record producers Category:Swedish songwriters Category:Record production duos Category:Songwriting duos Category:Swedish musical duos
title: Bagge & Peer
